abstract: Wall Street Journal: “Time Warner Inc. and a partnership between General Electric Co.’s NBC Universal and Blackstone Group LP have emerged as leading contenders to win an auction for the Weather Channel, ahead of Friday’s deadline for a second round of bids.” Bids are due Friday.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street Journal: “Time Warner Inc. and a partnership between General Electric Co.’s NBC Universal and Blackstone Group LP have emerged as leading contenders to win an auction for the Weather Channel, ahead of Friday’s deadline for a second round of bids.” Bids are due Friday.
